content:
SecurityElementBase Class

In this Article

Represents a base class with members common to an element that is used to configure security settings.

Syntax

Declaration

public class SecurityElementBase : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ConfigurationElement
  • ServiceModelConfigurationElement
  • ServiceModelExtensionElement
  • System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement
  • SecurityElementBase

Properties summary

AllowInsecureTransport

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsecured transport is permitted.
AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply

Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether a serialized token can be used on reply.
AuthenticationMode

Gets or sets the authentication setting used for message exchange.
BindingElementType

Gets the type of this binding element.
CanRenewSecurityContextToken

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the security context token can be renewed.
DefaultAlgorithmSuite

Gets or sets the default algorithm suite for this binding.
EnableUnsecuredResponse

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsecured response is permitted.
IncludeTimestamp

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether each message contains a timestamp.
IssuedTokenParameters

Gets the configuration element that specifies the current issued token.
KeyEntropyMode

Gets or sets the source of entropy used to create keys.
LocalClientSettings

Gets the local client security settings for this binding.
LocalServiceSettings

Gets the local service security settings for this binding.
MessageProtectionOrder

Gets or sets the order of message encryption and signing for this binding.
MessageSecurityVersion

Gets or sets the version used for message security.
Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.
ProtectTokens

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the security element base protects tokens.
RequireDerivedKeys

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether derived keys are required.
RequireSecurityContextCancellation

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether security context should be cancelled and terminated when it is no longer required.
RequireSignatureConfirmation

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether message signatures must be confirmed.
SecurityHeaderLayout

Gets or sets the order of elements in the security header for this binding.

Methods summary

AddBindingTemplate(Dictionary<AuthenticationMode,SecurityBindingElement>,AuthenticationMode)

Applies the specified configuration template to this instance.
AddBindingTemplates(Dictionary<AuthenticationMode,SecurityBindingElement>)

Applies the specified configuration templates to this instance.
ApplyConfiguration(BindingElement)

Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
CopyFrom(ServiceModelExtensionElement)

Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
CreateBindingElement()

Creates a custom binding element object from the setting of this instance.
CreateBindingElement(Boolean)

Creates a custom binding element object from the setting of this instance.
InitializeFrom(BindingElement)

Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.
InitializeNestedTokenParameterSettings(SecurityTokenParameters,Boolean)

Applies the specified security token settings to this instance.
SerializeElement(XmlWriter,Boolean)

Writes the contents of this configuration element to the configuration file when implemented in a derived class.
SerializeToXmlElement(XmlWriter,String)

Writes the outer tags of this configuration element to the configuration file.
Unmerge(ConfigurationElement,ConfigurationElement,ConfigurationSaveMode)

Modifies this configuration element to remove all values that should not be saved.

Properties

  • AllowInsecureTransport

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsecured transport is permitted.

    public bool AllowInsecureTransport { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if unsecured transport is permitted; otherwise, false.

  • AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply

    Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether a serialized token can be used on reply.

    public bool AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if a serialized token can be used on reply; otherwise, false.

  • AuthenticationMode

    Gets or sets the authentication setting used for message exchange.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode AuthenticationMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • AuthenticationMode

      The authentication setting used for message exchange.

  • BindingElementType

    Gets the type of this binding element.

    public override Type BindingElementType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The type of this binding element.

  • CanRenewSecurityContextToken

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the security context token can be renewed.

    public bool CanRenewSecurityContextToken { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the security context token can be renewed; otherwise, false.

  • DefaultAlgorithmSuite

    Gets or sets the default algorithm suite for this binding.

    public System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite DefaultAlgorithmSuite { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityAlgorithmSuite

      A SecurityAlgorithmSuite that specifies the default algorithm suite for this binding. The default is stem.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256*.

  • EnableUnsecuredResponse

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsecured response is permitted.

    public bool EnableUnsecuredResponse { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if unsecured response is permitted; otherwise, false.

  • IncludeTimestamp

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether each message contains a timestamp.

    public bool IncludeTimestamp { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if message contains a timestamp; otherwise, false.

  • IssuedTokenParameters

    Gets the configuration element that specifies the current issued token.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement IssuedTokenParameters { get; }

    Property Value

    • IssuedTokenParametersElement

      An IssuedTokenParametersElement that specifies the current issued token.

  • KeyEntropyMode

    Gets or sets the source of entropy used to create keys.

    public System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityKeyEntropyMode KeyEntropyMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityKeyEntropyMode

      A valid SecurityKeyEntropyMode value that specifies the source of entropy used to create keys. The default value is SecurityKeyEntropyMode.

  • LocalClientSettings

    Gets the local client security settings for this binding.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.LocalClientSecuritySettingsElement LocalClientSettings { get; }

    Property Value

    • LocalClientSecuritySettingsElement

      The local client security settings for this binding.

  • LocalServiceSettings

    Gets the local service security settings for this binding.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.LocalServiceSecuritySettingsElement LocalServiceSettings { get; }

    Property Value

    • LocalServiceSecuritySettingsElement

      The local service security settings for this binding.

  • MessageProtectionOrder

    Gets or sets the order of message encryption and signing for this binding.

    public System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder MessageProtectionOrder { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • MessageProtectionOrder

      A MessageProtectionOrder that specifies how message is protected. The default is MessageProtectionOrder.

  • MessageSecurityVersion

    Gets or sets the version used for message security.

    public System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion MessageSecurityVersion { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • MessageSecurityVersion

      A MessageSecurityVersion that specifies the version used for message security.

  • Properties

    Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

    protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }

    Property Value

    • ConfigurationPropertyCollection

      A ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

  • ProtectTokens

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the security element base protects tokens.

    public bool ProtectTokens { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the security element base protects tokens; otherwise, false.

  • RequireDerivedKeys

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether derived keys are required.

    public bool RequireDerivedKeys { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if derived keys are required; otherwise, false.

  • RequireSecurityContextCancellation

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether security context should be cancelled and terminated when it is no longer required.

    public bool RequireSecurityContextCancellation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if security context should be cancelled and terminated when it is no longer required; otherwise, false.

  • RequireSignatureConfirmation

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether message signatures must be confirmed.

    public bool RequireSignatureConfirmation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if message signatures must be confirmed; otherwise, false.

  • SecurityHeaderLayout

    Gets or sets the order of elements in the security header for this binding.

    public System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout SecurityHeaderLayout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityHeaderLayout

      A SecurityHeaderLayout that specifies the order of elements in the security header for this binding.

Methods

  • AddBindingTemplate(Dictionary<AuthenticationMode,SecurityBindingElement>,AuthenticationMode)

    Applies the specified configuration template to this instance.

    protected void AddBindingTemplate (System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode,System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> bindingTemplates, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode mode);

    Parameters

    • bindingTemplates
      Dictionary<AuthenticationMode,SecurityBindingElement>

      A pair that consists of an authentication mode and a binding element.

    • mode
      AuthenticationMode

      The authentication mode used for message exchange.

  • AddBindingTemplates(Dictionary<AuthenticationMode,SecurityBindingElement>)

    Applies the specified configuration templates to this instance.

    protected virtual void AddBindingTemplates (System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode,System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> bindingTemplates);

    Parameters

    • bindingTemplates
      Dictionary<AuthenticationMode,SecurityBindingElement>

      A pair that consists of an authentication mode and a binding element.

  • ApplyConfiguration(BindingElement)

    Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.

    public override void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement);

    Parameters

    • bindingElement
      BindingElement

      A binding element.

  • CopyFrom(ServiceModelExtensionElement)

    Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.

    public override void CopyFrom (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement from);

    Parameters

    • from
      ServiceModelExtensionElement

      The configuration element to be copied.

  • CreateBindingElement()

    Creates a custom binding element object from the setting of this instance.

    protected override System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement CreateBindingElement ();

    Returns

    • BindingElement

      A custom BindingElement object.

  • CreateBindingElement(Boolean)

    Creates a custom binding element object from the setting of this instance.

    protected virtual System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement CreateBindingElement (bool createTemplateOnly);

    Parameters

    • createTemplateOnly
      Boolean

      true to create only a template; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • BindingElement

      A custom BindingElement object.

  • InitializeFrom(BindingElement)

    Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.

    protected override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement);

    Parameters

    • bindingElement
      BindingElement

      A binding element.

  • InitializeNestedTokenParameterSettings(SecurityTokenParameters,Boolean)

    Applies the specified security token settings to this instance.

    protected virtual void InitializeNestedTokenParameterSettings (System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters sp, bool initializeNestedBindings);

    Parameters

    • sp
      SecurityTokenParameters

      The specified security token parameters.

    • initializeNestedBindings
      Boolean

      true to indicate that all the nested bindings are updated with the values specified by sp; otherwise, false.

  • SerializeElement(XmlWriter,Boolean)

    Writes the contents of this configuration element to the configuration file when implemented in a derived class.

    protected override bool SerializeElement (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, bool serializeCollectionKey);

    Parameters

    • writer
      XmlWriter

      The XML writer that writes the configuration file.

    • serializeCollectionKey
      Boolean

      true to serialize only the collection key properties; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if any data was actually serialized; otherwise, false.

  • SerializeToXmlElement(XmlWriter,String)

    Writes the outer tags of this configuration element to the configuration file.

    protected override bool SerializeToXmlElement (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, string elementName);

    Parameters

    • writer
      XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter that is used to write to the configuration file.

    • elementName
      String

      The name of the ConfigurationElement to be written.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the serialization is successful; otherwise, false.

  • Unmerge(ConfigurationElement,ConfigurationElement,ConfigurationSaveMode)

    Modifies this configuration element to remove all values that should not be saved.

    protected override void Unmerge (System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement sourceElement, System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement parentElement, System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode);

    Parameters

    • sourceElement
      ConfigurationElement

      A ConfigurationElement object at the current level that contains a merged view of the properties.

    • parentElement
      ConfigurationElement

      The parent ConfigurationElement object, or null if this is the top level.

    • saveMode
      ConfigurationSaveMode

      A ConfigurationSaveMode object that determines which property values to include.
